name: Where There's Smoke - Factory #1
description: In 1984, our house mysteriously burned down. For over 30 years, I've wondered if my dad started the blaze. "Where There's Smoke - Factory #1" 2995x5342, first edition - by Lance Weiler from a Robert Weiler photograph. This piece is part of an ongoing series where I collaborate with my dad who passed away in 2018. Each piece starts with an original photo he took of something burning. By collecting this piece, you'll get access to a special, immersive showing of "Where There's Smoke" + a digital download of a living, breathing art book. Sign up and more info: https://smokeproject.co/hen
